Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: The portrait is that of a well decorated room. A low fire crackles in a stone fireplace and gives a soft and welcoming glow to the area. Standing beside the fireplace is a tall, sleek pantheress whos beauty is captured upon the canvas. Those whom know her will recognize Wynter. Her sleek, creamy fur carefully arranged, her thigh-length satiny obsidian black hair, worn in a vine-like bun design and accented with flowers. Her gold-speckled azure eyes which seem to capture the flames of the fire and are almost equally radiant. Her fine nose shows at the slight sideways angle of the portrait, her heart-shaped mouth with sensual lips curved in an irrepressible smile as her eyes seem to be staring directly at you as you observe the painting. She is wearing a stylish dark wine colored satin hanging-sleeve gown which seems to hug her curves sensually without being revealing with a raven damask waist sash wrapped delicately around her. A pair of raven damask slippers barely protruding from the bottom of the gown. An intricate silver ring denoting the guild of Rainbow Rags adorns one finger. A raven damask hooded cloak is draped elegantly about her shoulders with the hood back to reveal her delicate features. A raven damask purse hangs casually at her side.
A painting of Wynter, standing by a fireplace.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: "Zaria is a salient, sinewy tigress with short, pristine amber and black striped fur. She is sitting on the freshly trimmed grass of the park, a row of poppy plants arrayed behind her. Her feet, adorned by black leather high heels are tucked to her right side as she props herself up comfortably with with left hand. Her hands and arms are covered with a pair of gossamer white sendal long gloves. Her waist length, dynamic black-cherry hair cascades down over her shoulders. A cinereous, silver ear cuff decorates her right ear and a cool-blue topaz and opalescent silver stud glints from her left lobe. Her snapdragon red lips are curved into a light smile, barely revealing a hint of her achromatic white teeth. Her cheeks seem slightly colored as a soft blush spreads barely noticeable across her face. A red organza cordial dress perfectly matching and augmenting her lips hugs perfectly to her delicately striped breasts, along her sinewy body down her wholesome thighs then the frills covering most of her limber legs."
"A painting of Zaria, elegantly dressed in a fabulous dress, sitting in the park."
